directions: Heat butter in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir onion and garlic until onion is transparent, 5 to 10 minutes. Add chicken stock, beef broth, and water; bring to a simmer. Stir tomato paste, tomatoes with jalapenos, and potatoes into broth mixture; simmer until potatoes are slightly tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
Stir celery, zucchini, carrots, and garbanzo beans into soup mixture; simmer until potatoes are tender and flavors have blended, 45 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste with basil (such as Hunt's®)
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with jalapenos
title: Bek's Minestrone Soup
